participant_1.background:
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.
I'm not a good cook, but I do enjoy making Christmas dinner for my family.
I drive a pickup truck because it's perfect for hauling my skydiving gear and going off-road.
i enjoy dressing up to go out clubbing.
I drive a Jeep Wrangler because it is a rugged vehicle that is perfect for my hobbies.

I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes.
i like going to foreign countries.
i love to crochet.
I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music.
My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

content.text: I just got back from a trip to Japan!
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! I've always wanted to visit Japan. What was your favorite part of the trip?
I loved all the food! I ate so much sushi and ramen.
That sounds delicious! I love sushi too. I've been to a few countries in Europe, but I've never been to Asia.
I've only been to Europe once, but I loved it. I went to Italy and France.
Oh nice! I've been to Italy too. It was so beautiful. I loved the food and the architecture.
I agree! I also loved the history.
Yeah, it's so cool to see all the old buildings and ruins.
Yeah, it's really amazing. I'm glad you got to experience it.
Me too! I'm hoping to travel more in the future.
Same here! I'm already planning my next trip.
Where are you thinking of going?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to South America or Africa.
Oh wow, those would be amazing trips! I've always wanted to go to Africa.
Me too! I think it would be so cool to see all the animals.
Yeah, it would be! I'm sure you'd have an amazing time.
